name: The Only Olympic Goal Ever Scored in a World Cup. Marcos Coll, Colombia vs URSS, Chile 1962.
description: This goal is partly responsible for the first point Colombia got in the first world cup. At that time, the "black spider" from the Soviet Union team was the best goalkeeper in the world, and the team had won the European Tournament a couple of years before. Marcos Coll scored the first and only Olympic goal in football history, he was very proud of this achievement all his life until he passed away in 2017, minting this in the blockchain means we now have a virtual place to pay  respects to a great players and a great achievement. Order NFT for Ariel.tez
